title: Hawk and Chick vs Seaweed Monster
description: It was a time in Japan when evil monsters would attack nice little villages for no good reason and the only force in all of Japan who can stop them: Hawk and Chick!
altHero: Hawk carries his daughter Chick in a basket on his back
alt1: Hawk and Chick brush a man’s hair
alt2: Hawk and Chick fight a giant seaweed monster
alt3: the monster’s seaweed wraps all around Hawk’s body
alt4: the monster picks up a sword-wielding Chick
